data.lyric:
[ti:Lucky You (Explicit)]
[ar:Eminem/Joyner Lucas]
[al:Kamikaze]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.15]Lucky You (Explicit) - Eminem/Joyner Lucas
[00:00.81]Producer：Eminem/Joyner Lucas
[00:00.95]Joyner Lucas：
[00:03.04]Whoa Joyner Joyner yeah yeah yeah
[00:10.83]Yeah I done did a lot of things in my day I admit it
[00:14.64]I don't take back what I say if I said it then I meant it
[00:17.87]All my life I want a Grammy but I'll prolly never get it
[00:20.92]I ain't never had no trophy or no motherf**kin' ribbon
[00:24.03]F**k the system I'm that n**ga bend the law cut the rules
[00:27.24]I'm about to risk it all I ain't got too much to lose
[00:30.40]Y'all been eatin' long enough it's my turn to cut the food
[00:33.44]Pass the plate
[00:34.23]Where my drink
[00:35.11]This my day lucky you
[00:36.59]F**k you too woo
[00:37.84]Y'all gotta move y'all gotta move y'all gotta move
[00:40.89]Give me some room give me some room give me the juice
[00:44.07]Hop out the coupe hop out the coupe hop out and shoot
[00:47.18]Y'all gotta move y'all gotta move give me the juice
[00:50.44]Back on my bullsh*t my back to the wall
[00:51.86]Turn my back on you all of you finished
[00:53.51]Back to these bullets it's back to the job
[00:55.02]Pull my MAC out and all of you runnin'
[00:56.60]Back on my hood sh*t it's back to the pushin'
[00:58.24]These packs and I'm actually pumpin'
[00:59.32]Can't f**k with you rappers you practically suckin'
[01:00.83]You mighta went platinum but that don't mean nothin'
[01:02.45]I'm actually buzzin' this time
[01:03.71]Straight out the kitchen I told 'em the oven is mine
[01:05.72]I do not f**k with you guys
[01:06.79]If I don't kill you just know you gon' suffer this time
[01:08.80]I ain't no gangster but I got some bangers
[01:10.18]Some chains and some blades and a couple of knives
[01:11.90]Choppers and jammies a partridge a pear tree
[01:13.43]My twelve days of Christmas was nothin' but lies
[01:15.47]I run at you hard like a sumo sumo
[01:16.90]They say I talk like a chulo chulo
[01:18.53]I live in Mars I'm not Bruno woo
[01:20.08]B**ch I'm a dog call me Cujo rah
[01:21.62]You play your cards I reverse on you all
[01:23.00]And I might just drop 4 like a Uno bup
[01:24.86]Cállate boca mejor maricón little puto and all of you culo
[01:27.96]They've invented a level off in the ghetto to ghetto
[01:29.48]Lookin' for somethin' I prolly can never find now
[01:30.97]Sh*t get relevant until the beef die down
[01:32.37]In truth a n**ga just really want me tied down
[01:34.08]I've been alone and I never needed nobody
[01:35.29]Just only me and my shawty I'll tell these n**gas to lie down
[01:37.33]Keep all the money I never wanted the lifestyle
[01:38.58]I just pray to God that my son'll be alright now
[01:40.33]I said ain't no love for the other side
[01:41.88]Or anyone who ever want smoke
[01:43.33]Joyner
[01:43.84]When I die I'm goin' out as the underdog who never lost hope
[01:46.49]You in the wrong cab down the wrong path
[01:48.15]N**ga wrong way wrong road
[01:49.77]Snakes in the grass tryna slither fast
[01:51.41]I just bought a f**kin' lawn mower
[01:52.39]Eminem：
[01:52.53]I done said a lotta things in my day I admit it
[01:54.98]This is payback in a way I regret it that I did it
[01:58.27]I done won a couple Grammys but I sold my soul to get 'em
[02:01.38]Wasn't in it for the trophies just the f**kin' recognition
[02:04.52]F**k's the difference
[02:05.27]I'm that cracker bend the law f**k the rules
[02:07.58]Man I used to risk it all now I got too much to lose
[02:10.76]I been eatin' long enough man my stomach should be full
[02:13.88]I just ate lick the plate my buffet lucky me
[02:16.87]F**k you think
[02:17.74]Woo
[02:18.10]I got a couple of mansions
[02:19.68]Still I don't have any manners
[02:21.23]You got a couple of ghost writers
[02:22.47]But to these kids it don't actually matter
[02:24.39]They're askin' me
[02:24.77]What the f**k happened to hip-hop
[02:25.87]I said I don't have any answers
[02:27.12]'Cause I took an L when I dropped my last album
[02:28.89]It hurt me like hell but I'm back on these rappers
[02:30.67]And actually comin' from humble beginnings
[02:31.83]I'm somewhat uncomfortable winning
[02:32.93]I wish I could say
[02:33.74]What a wonderful feeling
[02:34.45]We're on the upswing like we're punchin' the ceiling
[02:36.08]But nothin' is feeling like anyone has any f**kin' ability
[02:38.57]To even stick to a subject it's killin' me
[02:40.19]The inability to pin humility
[02:41.94]Hatata batata why don't we make a bunch of
[02:43.64]F**kin' songs about nothin' and mumble 'em
[02:44.89]F**k it I'm goin' for the jugular
[02:46.07]Sh*t is a circus you clowns that are comin' up
[02:47.60]Don't give an ounce of a motherf**ker
[02:48.91]'Bout the ones that were here before you to make raps
[02:50.75]Let's recap way back MC's that wreak havoc on tape decks
[02:53.73]ADATs where the G Rap's and Kane's at
[02:55.33]We need 3 stacks ASAP and bring Masta Ace back
[02:57.66]'Cause half of these rappers have brain damage
[02:59.53]All the lean rappin' face tats syruped out like tree sap
[03:01.74]I don't hate trap and I don't wanna seem mad
[03:03.42]But in fact where the old me at
[03:04.86]The same cat
[03:05.45]That would take that feed-back and aim back I need that
[03:07.97]But I think it's inevitable
[03:08.72]They know what button to press or what lever to pull
[03:10.39]To get me to snap though lil b**ch
[03:11.33]And if I'm payin' attention I'm probably makin' it bigger
[03:12.67]But you've been takin' ya d**ks in the f**kin' back ho'
[03:14.39]Get it
[03:14.73]On the brink any minute got me thinkin' of finishin'
[03:16.30]Everything wit' acetaminophen and reapin' the benefits
[03:17.40]I'm asleep at the wheel again
[03:18.36]As I peak into thinkin' about an evil intent
[03:19.82]Of another beat I'ma kill again
[03:20.82]'Cause even if I gotta end up eating a pill again
[03:22.57]Even ketamine or methamphetamine with the minithin
[03:23.92]It better be at least 70 to 300 milligram
[03:25.38]And I might as well 'cause I'ma end up bein' a villain again
[03:27.41]Levels to this sh*t I got an elevator
[03:28.27]You could never say to me I'm not a f**kin' record breaker
[03:30.07]I sound like a broken record every time I break a record
[03:31.84]Nobody could ever take away the legacy I made a navigator
[03:33.69]Motherf**ker know I got a right to be this way
[03:35.28]I got spite inside my DNA
[03:36.86]But I wrote 'til the wheels fall off I'm workin' tirelessly ayy
[03:40.42]It's the moment y'all been waitin' for
[03:41.86]Like California wishin' rain would pour in that drought
[03:43.98]Y'all have been prayin' for
[03:45.09]My downfall from the 8 Mile to the Southpaw
[03:47.29]Still the same Marshall that outlaw
[03:48.95]That they say as a writer might've fell off
[03:50.55]But back on that bull like the cowboys
[03:52.07]Joyner Lucas/Eminem：
[03:52.64]So y'all gotta move yeah
[03:53.44]Y'all gotta move yeah
[03:54.60]Y'all gotta move
[03:55.35]Give me some room give me some room give me the juice
[03:58.53]Hop out the coupe hop out the coupe hop out and shoot
[04:01.80]Y'all gotta move y'all gotta move give me the juice
data.trans:
[ti:Lucky You (Explicit)]
[ar:Eminem/Joyner Lucas]
[al:Kamikaze]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.15]//
[00:00.81]//
[00:00.95]//
[00:03.04]//
[00:10.83]我承认 我确实做了很多不好的事
[00:14.64]我说出的话不会收回 既然我都说了 那就是认真的
[00:17.87]我穷尽一生都想争一座格莱美 但我可能永远得不到了
[00:20.92]我从没得到过奖杯或是绶带
[00:24.03]去他的这破体制 我才是那个改变法律 改变规则的人
[00:27.24]我要破釜沉舟 我已没什么可以失去了
[00:30.40]你们已经享受很久的独食了 现在该让我分一杯羹了
[00:33.44]盘子递过来
[00:34.23]我的酒呢
[00:35.11]这是我的时代 你个幸运儿
[00:36.59]顺便送你一句 去你的
[00:37.84]你们赶紧让道 你们赶紧让道 你们赶紧让道
[00:40.89]给我让点位置 给我让点位置 给我来点果汁
[00:44.07]跳出车来 跳出车来 跳出来开枪
[00:47.18]你们赶紧让道 你们赶紧让道 给我来点果汁
[00:50.44]又谈到我说的废话 我已无路可退
[00:51.86]把你们甩在身后 你们都完蛋了
[00:53.51]又说到子弹 咱以前就是干这个的
[00:55.02]掏出我的MAC 你们都得四处逃窜
[00:56.60]说到我的地盘 依然十分活跃
[00:58.24]拖着我的东西 我依然气势如虹
[00:59.32]不能惹你们这些说唱歌手 其实你们弱爆了
[01:00.83]你们可能会创作出白金唱片 但那毫无意义
[01:02.45]其实这一回我老开心了
[01:03.71]我已经跟他们挑明了 这生意是我的
[01:05.72]我不会和你们扯
[01:06.79]就算我这次不杀你们 也得让你们尝尝苦头
[01:08.80]我不是什么匪帮 但我还是有几把刷子的
[01:10.18]有链子 有大刀 还有几把小匕首
[01:11.90]有砍刀 有女人 一座破房子 还有一颗梨树
[01:13.43]我的圣诞节除了谎言什么也没有
[01:15.47]我的进攻就像相扑手一样猛
[01:16.90]他们说我讲话的时候超级酷
[01:18.53]我住在火星 我不是火星哥
[01:20.08]** 我是一条疯狗 我叫库卓
[01:21.62]你们的游戏规则 我统统推翻
[01:23.00]我可能会像玩乌诺牌一样让你重新捡起四张牌
[01:24.86]最好闭上你们的臭嘴 你们这些家伙都是胆小鬼
[01:27.96]他们给这贫民窟制定了更高的标准 越来越老旧
[01:29.48]我在找的东西可能现在永找不到
[01:30.97]凡事都很重要 除非人们的过节统统消除
[01:32.37]事实上 有个家伙就想阻碍我
[01:34.08]我一直一个人 我从不需要任何人
[01:35.29]只有我和我的女人 我会让这些家伙好好躺着
[01:37.33]把所有钱都存着 我不想要这种生活
[01:38.58]我向上帝祈祷 希望我的儿子能好好的
[01:40.33]我说过 我不喜欢新派说唱
[01:41.88]也不喜欢任何吸烟的人
[01:43.33]//
[01:43.84]当我死去时 我要像从不放弃希望的弱者一样冲出来
[01:46.49]你上错了车 走错了路
[01:48.15]哥们 走错了 走偏了
[01:49.77]暗敌想偷袭
[01:51.41]正好我买了个暗敌清除机
[01:52.39]//
[01:52.53]我承认我说过很多不好听的话
[01:54.98]可以说这就是报应 我不该那样做的
[01:58.27]我确实赢了几座格莱美 但那是我出卖灵魂换来的
[02:01.38]我不是为了奖杯 只是为了得到认可
[02:04.52]有什么区别呢
[02:05.27]我就是你们厌恶的白人 篡改法律 不守规则
[02:07.58]哥们 我以前也是倾尽一切 而现在我有太多顾虑
[02:10.76]我享受了太久的独食 哥们 现在我应该饱了
[02:13.88]我狼吞虎咽 盘子舔得干干净净 享受着盛宴 我真是个幸运儿
[02:16.87]你想什么呢
[02:17.74]//
[02:18.10]我有几座豪宅
[02:19.68]我还是没什么礼貌
[02:21.23]你有不少枪手
[02:22.47]但对这些孩子来说 没什么关系
[02:24.39]他们问我
[02:24.77]嘻哈音乐到底怎么了
[02:25.87]我说我也不知道
[02:27.12]因为我上一张专辑也潦草收场了
[02:28.89]这让我非常难受 但我回来了
[02:30.67]而且现在的我没那么大的气焰了
[02:31.83]我貌似并不太喜欢赢
[02:32.93]我希望我能这样说
[02:33.74]这感觉真棒
[02:34.45]我们正青云直上 好像就要冲破天际
[02:36.08]但感觉谁都没有真正的实力
[02:38.57]连紧扣主题的能力都没有 真是急死我了
[02:40.19]没有笔下留情的能力
[02:41.94]为何我们不写一堆
[02:43.64]咕哝咕哝不知要表达什么的歌
[02:44.89]去他的 我要直击要害
[02:46.07]这玩意儿就是个马戏团 你们这些小丑现身了
[02:47.60]我一丁点都不在乎
[02:48.91]关于以前那些说唱歌手
[02:50.75]让我们回顾一下 很久以前 那些MC掀起巨浪的时候大家还在用磁带机
[02:53.73]ADAT录音机 Kool G Rap和Big Daddy Kane这样的人哪里去找
[02:55.33]我们需要André 3000 还要让Masta Ace回来
[02:57.66]因为现在这些说唱歌手有一半都脑子有问题
[02:59.53]那些所谓的rapper吹嘘加了难喝的要死的“料”的酒精 还流行在脸上纹身
[03:01.74]我不讨厌Trap 但我不想像个疯子
[03:03.42]但事实上 以前的我去哪儿了
[03:04.86]以前的我
[03:05.45]会了解别人的看法然后发起反击 我需要那个我
[03:07.97]但我觉得这是必然的
[03:08.72]但他们知道该按哪个键 该拉哪根杆
[03:10.39]让我愤怒起来
[03:11.33]如果我注意到了 我可能会变本加厉
[03:12.67]但你们都搞砸了
[03:14.39]明白吗
[03:14.73]危机边缘 我一直都想结束
[03:16.30]这一切纷争 见好就收
[03:17.40]我再次不顾一切向前冲
[03:18.36]如果我脑子里出现了什么邪恶的东西
[03:19.82]下一秒 我可能就会再次大开杀戒
[03:20.82]因为就算我不得不再次吃药
[03:22.57]就算是k*或者混了麻黄素的甲基苯丙胺
[03:23.92]剂量也最好是70到300毫克
[03:25.38]最后我可能啥事儿都没有 因为我最终会再次变成大坏蛋
[03:27.41]爬这嘻哈界的高楼 我有通天电梯 不在怕的
[03:28.27]你无法否认 我就是破纪录的人
[03:30.07]每次破纪录的时候 我的声音就像坏掉的唱片一样不断重复
[03:31.84]谁都无法夺走我创造的东西 我绝不会倒下
[03:33.69]王八蛋 现在我有权利这样做了
[03:35.28]我的怨恨深深埋在我的基因里
[03:36.86]但我马不停蹄地写 不知疲倦地工作
[03:40.42]这就是你们期待已久的时刻
[03:41.86]就像旱灾时的加州期待下雨一样
[03:43.98]你们一直在祈祷我倒下
[03:45.09]从《八英里》到《铁拳》从未停止过
[03:47.29]如今我依然是那个无法无天的马歇尔
[03:48.95]他们说我是个作家 可能会跌下神坛
[03:50.55]但我坐在牛背上 就像牛仔一样稳稳当当
[03:52.07]//
[03:52.64]所以你们赶紧让道
[03:53.44]你们赶紧让道
[03:54.60]你们赶紧让道
[03:55.35]给我让点位置 给我让点位置 给我来点果汁
[03:58.53]跳出车来 跳出车来 跳出来开枪
[04:01.80]你们赶紧让道 你们赶紧让道 给我来点果汁
